open.title: Vumatel installation and maintenance problems | Khayelitsha & Delft
open.description: We would like to inform you about the challenges that we are currently experiencing with installation & maintenance activities in the Khayelitsha and Delft areas, Western Cape. Due to increased violence in this area, our contractor partners are not able to freely access the area to work. All maintenance and installation activities in this area will be on hold until further notice. The safety of our contractor partners remains our priority.

open.title: FrogFoot maintenance | Cape Town
open.description: FrogFoot is conducting maintenance in Cape Town on the 16th of June from 17:00 to the 17th of June at 07:30 users affected will experience limited to no connectivity during the maintenance window. We apologize for any inconvenience caused.

closed.title: Fibre Outage | Western, Eastern & Northern Cape
closed.description: Afrihost engineers are working on resolving an issue that is affecting fibre connectivity in the Western, Eastern and Northern Cape. We apologise for the inconvenience caused.
closed.resolution: An emergency change has been completed to mitigate the impact. Outage resolved.

updates.content: An emergency change has been completed to mitigate the impact. Outage resolved.
